<soyjavi> CREATING STUFF FOR OTHERS

<soyjavi>

...creating stuff for others

scroll down to learn more
This site is my personal design playground. I created it to encourage myself to keep having fun with design – to experiment and explore the craft outside of my comfort zone.

I consider myself a maverick by nature and therefore I always going against the grain. I try to improve my knowledge and thinking for new ways to create software. In 2011 I founded Tapquo, a small company specializing in the creation of products for internet, which has given me the opportunity to create solutions for thousands of people around the world.

I am currently researching new ways of working through the software. My adventure is giving me the opportunity to travel around the world looking for new poles of creation, innovation and improvement. Everyday I remember only live once and we should achieve our dreams. I'm living mine today and I feel lucky.
